Gee, I was almost dumb enough to wonder about the subtitles...forgetting completely that this is a short film. 

Film is about the relationship between two prisoners, which makes the prison guard rather jealous. He tries his best to break it up, by terrorizing one of them, but the bond is strong, and the guard's authority is to no avail.

This film is said to be the source for the Andy Warhol films (see wiki). 

Thanks a lot for this rare short.
